text: Condominium is too good. More than we can ask for. Wonderful management and friendly staff. please like my review if you think I have done Justice in my review
Very good, everything is well maintained and is pretty much expected from a new estate. Network here maybe not very good but hope it gets better in the future.
Nice landscaping, but units are located very close to each other.  Feels a little claustrophobic when you stepped out of the lift.  Interior finishing is average.
Affordable condo unit in SG so far. #FilipinaSG #ITSG

Been staying here for more than a year now. Generally, the facilities are good and the the condo is built beautifully with a gorgeous landscape. Overall land area may not be as large as older condos but you can take a nice stroll inside the condo as well as lie on the hammocks. The condo looks beautiful in the evening with the many shining fairy lights. The condo has also easy access to punggol plaza, childcare centres and bus stops. Looking forward to the upcoming new cross island mrt line connecting to rivera mrt, just a 5min walking distance away.
